summary: Removed legacy player-character artifacts and reset the repository to a Session 0 baseline. Cleared live campaign progress, old session files, PC-specific references, and first-impression state while preserving generic systems and quest architecture.

changes.change: Reset to Session 0 baseline with no active PC and no progress.
Reset all live clock progress to 0 and statuses to inactive/not_started.
Removed old PC references and genericized relationship/story text.
Removed old PC references and future-history assumptions from quest text.
Made first-impression system safe when no active PC exists.
Stopped auto-selecting a fallback PC for first-impression hooks.
Stopped treating example_pc.json as a live PC fallback.
Removed hard-coded legacy PC fallback for pending PC updates.
